text: Big Ant Studios Pty Ltd is an Australian video game developer based in Melbourne. Founded in 2001 by present-day chief executive officer Ross Symons, the company specialises in the development of sports games. == Games developed == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year ! Title !
